pkgmetadata.longdescription: Yi is a text editor written in Haskell and extensible in Haskell. The goal of the Yi project is to provide a flexible, powerful, and correct editor for haskell hacking.

use.flag: Runtime binary will be compiled with profiling and RTS options enabled.
Runtime binary will be compiled with eventlog and RTS options enabled.
